initial_event.event_description: Starts an specific period in-game. Requires 'set_timer = true' so it will only resume other sequences after its completion.

test_single_enemy.event_description: Spawn a single specific enemy in scene. Useful for certain controlled events.

test_spawn_sequence.event_description: Spawns a selected sequence of enemies. Also uses 'set_timer' as to keep a clean visual of the sequence without random enemies.

test_miniboss.event_description: Spawns a mini boss. Can pause stage timer if required, and only resumes when it recieves a signal from the enemy.

retest_random_period.event_description: Replica of event_001 to execute in another period of the stage. Probably will be repeated a lot

retest_spawn_sequence.event_description: Spawns another selected sequence of enemies.

test_filler.event_description: Acts as a empty filler between previous events and a certain portion of the stage. It just needs the 'stop_before' variable for it to work

event_010.event_description: Always stops time, acts as a great threat to be overcome during stage. Can be final or not. Has the power to change certain aspects of the scene itself.
